pages.text: Comparator can detect work status of stew pots. Working pots has a fixed output 0. But idle one outputs 1, plus each bowl of soup or each ingredient add output by 1.
Also, $(l:resting/oil)Gravy boats$(/l) can be detected. Each remaining use send out 3, while empty ones send out 0.
Pans can also output signal. Alike pots, Pans has a fixed output of 0. But idle one outputs 1, plus each ingredient add output by 1. If the pans' output slot is full, it constantly output 15.
Dishes or soups on the world can submit 15 if it is not eaten. While empty ones submit 0.
$(l:intro/wolf_statue)Wolf statue$(/l) can submit 3 or 6 based on its temperature. If it is heated by stoves, the output would be increased by 9.
